article.title: Our top 25 recipes of 2025
article.description:
Democracy Dies in Darkness

In this article

By [Victoria Caruso](https://www.washingtonpost.com/people/victoria-caruso/)

It’s been a busy year for the Post Food section, and after months of testing and publishing new recipes every week, it’s exciting to see which ones captured readers’ attention most.

As we look back at the most readrecipes of 2025, we see some clear trends: Approachable weeknight meals, including simplified classics, hearty one-pot dishes, skillet meals and saucy bakes, dominated. The year’s most popular recipes include pastas (two of which are inspired by pizza); cozy soups and stews; a handful of sweets; and recipes that emphasize protein.
